stepTitle: James and Kathy have a rematch for their race on roller skates. Again, they race along a long, straight truck, and whoever has gone the farthest after 3-sec wins. Their speeds are the same as last time with James's velocity at $$f(t)=2t+5$$ $$\frac{ft}{sec}$$ and Kathy's velocity of $$g(t)=cos\left(\frac{pit}{2}\right)+10$$ $$\frac{ft}{sec}$$. Who is going to win the race this time around?
